title: Jazz Pianist Ted Rosenthal Has A Feel For Gershwin
teaser: Rosenthal has played George Gershwin's "Rhapsody in Blue" solo and with symphonic and jazz orchestras. Now he's recorded a version for jazz trio as part of an all-Gershwin album.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
